mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_name, product_brand, start_price, product_content, member_id, trade_method) VALUES (#{product_name}, #{product_brand}, #{start_price}, #{product_content}, #{member_id}, #{trade_method})
mapper.select: SELECT product_no FROM product WHERE member_id = #{id} ORDER BY product_no DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_img(product_no, product_orifile, product_file) VALUES (#{product_no}, #{product_orifile}, #{product_file})
